item.title: Charlie Kirk shooting: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox shares new details
item.description: Investigators are still working to determine the motive for the killing of Charlie Kirk.

item.title: U.S. and Chinese officials hold talks in Spain on trade irritants, TikTok deadline
item.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer arrived before Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng and China's top trade...

item.title: Drone breaches Romanian airspace during Russian attack on neighboring Ukraine
item.description: Romania's defense minister said the F-16 pilots came close to taking down the drone as it was flying very low before it left national airspace toward ...

item.title: Trump says he's ready to put 'major sanctions' on Russia if NATO nations do the same
item.description: President Donald Trump has repeatedly threatened to impose sanctions on Russia over its invasion of Ukraine, but has so far held off from doing so.

item.title: Fed governor Cook asks appeals court to reject White House's bid to remove her from Fed board
item.description: Federal Reserve Gov. Lisa Cook is asking a U.S. appeals court to reject the Trump administration's latest bid to remove her from her post.
